system.description: Its Speed is increased by 1 Space (you can choose this Trait up to 5 times).

effects.name: Swift
effects.description: Its Speed is increased by 1 Space (you can choose this Trait up to 5 times).

system.description: You gain Skill Mastery in 2 of the following Skills of your choice, up to your Skill Mastery Cap: Acrobatics, Animal, Athletics, Awareness, Intimidation, Stealth, or Survival. If your Mastery with the chosen Skill is already equal to your Skill Mastery Cap, you instead gain ADV on the Check.

You have up to 2 Natural Weapons (claws, horns, fangs, tail, etc) which you can use to make Unarmed Strikes that deal 1 Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (your choice upon gaining this Trait).

System Tip: Configure that item after taking Natural Weapon feature to make it fit you choices. Also you can modify it when taking Natural Weapon upgrading featres.

effects.name: Attribute Increase
